name: polygon_hollow_section
description: Constructs a regular hollow polygon section.

n_sides.description: Number of sides of the polygon

n_r.description: Number of points discretising the inner and outer radii (optional)

d.description: Depth of the box girder section in mm
Depth of the section in mm

n_r.description: Number of points discretising the radius

name: calculate_geometric_properties
description: Calculates geometric properties of the cross-section and stores them. This includes area, perimeter, mass, first moments of area (section modulus), second moments of area (moment of interia), radii of gyration, principal axis properties, and yield moments.

name: calculate_warping_properties
description: Calculates all the warping properties of the cross-section and stores them. This includes Torsion constant (J/It), Shear centre, Shear areas, Warping constant (C/Iw) and Monosymmetry constant. The geometric properties must be calculated prior to the calculation of the warping properties.

name: calculate_stress
description: Calculates the cross-section stress resulting from design actions and returns a :class: {sec.post.stress_post.StressPost} object allowing the post-processing of the stress results. A geometric analysis must be performed prior to performing a stress analysis. Further, if the shear force or torsion is non-zero a warping analysis must also be performed.

vx.description: Shear force acting in the x-direction/horizontal direction in N.

vy.description: Shear force acting in the y-direction/vertical direction in N.

mxx.description: Bending moment about the centroidal xx-axis/horizontal axis in Nmm.

myy.description: Bending moment about the centroidal yy-axis/vertical axis in Nmm.

m11.description: Bending moment about the centroidal 11-axis in Nmm.

m22.description: Bending moment about the centroidal 22-axis in Nmm.

mzz.description: Torsion moment about the centroidal zz-axis in Nmm.

name: plot_stress
description: Plots filled stress contours over the finite element mesh.

stress.description: Type of stress to plot: 'axial stresses' = 'zz' , 'shear stresses' = 'zxy', 'von mises stresses' = 'vm'.
